mapper.select: select help_state, forms_seq, title, kor_name, eng_name, state, payment, add_date from forms where ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{find}, '%') and id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2} order by forms_seq desc
select title, forms_seq from forms where id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2} order by forms_seq desc

select help_state, forms_seq, kor_name, eng_name, div_sub, p_class, mix, power, title, SUBSTR((add_date),1,4) "add_year", replace(SUBSTR((add_date),6,2), '0', '') "add_month", replace(SUBSTR((add_date),9,2), '0', '') "add_day", SUBSTR((payment_add_date),1,4) "payment_year", replace(SUBSTR((payment_add_date),6,2), '0', '') "payment_month", replace(SUBSTR((payment_add_date),9,2), '0', '') "payment_day", SUBSTR((help_add_date),1,4) "help_year", replace(SUBSTR((help_add_date),6,2), '0', '') "help_month", replace(SUBSTR((help_add_date),9,2), '0', '') "help_day" from forms where ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{find}, '%') and id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2} order by forms_seq desc
select count(*) from forms where id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2}
select count(*) from forms where state=1 and id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2}
select count(*) from forms where state=2 and id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2}

SELECT forms_seq, p_class, div_mid, title, kor_name, eng_name, payment_bank, payment_name, state, payment FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (select * from forms T1, (SELECT @rownum := 0) T2 where ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{find}, '%') and id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2} and (payment=2 or payment=3) ORDER BY forms_seq desc)as forms) a)as t3 WHERE t3.rn BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
select count(*) from (select * from forms where ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{find}, '%')) as payment
mapper.update: update forms set payment_pic=#{payment_pic}, payment=3, payment_add_date=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y/%m/%d') where forms_seq=#{forms_seq}
mapper.select: select forms_seq, help_state, power, mix, p_class, eng_name, kor_name, div_sub, div_mid, help_content, title, SUBSTR((add_date),1,4) "add_year", replace(SUBSTR((add_date),6,2), '0', '') "add_month", replace(SUBSTR((add_date),9,2), '0', '') "add_day", SUBSTR((payment_add_date),1,4) "payment_year", replace(SUBSTR((payment_add_date),6,2), '0', '') "payment_month", replace(SUBSTR((payment_add_date),9,2), '0', '') "payment_day", SUBSTR((help_add_date),1,4) "help_year", replace(SUBSTR((help_add_date),6,2), '0', '') "help_month", replace(SUBSTR((help_add_date),9,2), '0', '') "help_day" from forms where forms_seq=#{forms_seq} and id1=#{id1} and id2=#{id2} and id3=#{id3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2}
select forms_seq, title, id1, id2, id3, email1, email2, kor_name, eng_name, p_class, add_date, payment_pic from forms where forms_seq=#{forms_seq}
